paragraphs.title: Import needed packages
paragraphs.text:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType
import org.graphframes._
import org.graphframes.lib.AggregateMessages

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType
import org.graphframes._
import org.graphframes.lib.AggregateMessages

paragraphs.text:
%md 
For this tutorial, we'll be using data from http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&DB_Short_Name=On-Time.
The data has been cleaned and tranformed and written to MapR-DB JSON with the following format
{"id":"ATL_BOS_2018-01-01_WN_170","fldate":"2018-01-01","month":1,"dofW":1,"carrier":"WN","src":"ATL","dst":"BOS","crsdephour":21,
"crsdeptime":2055,"depdelay":14.0,"crsarrtime":2330,"arrdelay":0.0,"crselapsedtime":155.0,"dist":946.0}

We use a Scala case class and Structype to define the schema, corresponding to a row in MapR-DB  JSON

msg.data:
For this tutorial, we’ll be using data from http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&DB_Short_Name=On-Time.
The data has been cleaned and tranformed and written to MapR-DB JSON with the following format
{“id”:“ATL_BOS_2018-01-01_WN_170”,“fldate”:“2018-01-01”,“month”:1,“dofW”:1,“carrier”:“WN”,“src”:“ATL”,“dst”:“BOS”,“crsdephour”:21,
“crsdeptime”:2055,“depdelay”:14.0,“crsarrtime”:2330,“arrdelay”:0.0,“crselapsedtime”:155.0,“dist”:946.0}

We use a Scala case class and Structype to define the schema, corresponding to a row in MapR-DB JSON

paragraphs.title: Define Schema for JSON file data
paragraphs.text:
case class Flight(id: String,fldate: String,month:Integer, dofW: Integer, 
  carrier: String, src: String,dst: String, crsdephour: Integer, crsdeptime: Integer, 
  depdelay: Double, crsarrtime: Integer, arrdelay: Double, crselapsedtime: Double, dist: Double)
  
  val schema = StructType(Array(
    StructField("id", StringType, true),
    StructField("fldate", StringType, true),
    StructField("month", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("dofW", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("carrier", StringType, true),
    StructField("src", StringType, true),
    StructField("dst", StringType, true),
    StructField("crsdephour", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("crsdeptime", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("depdelay", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("crsarrtime", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("arrdelay", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("crselapsedtime", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("dist", DoubleType, true)
  ))

msg.data:
defined class Flight
schema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(id,StringType,true), StructField(fldate,StringType,true), StructField(month,IntegerType,true), StructField(dofW,IntegerType,true), StructField(carrier,StringType,true), StructField(src,StringType,true), StructField(dst,StringType,true), StructField(crsdephour,IntegerType,true), StructField(crsdeptime,IntegerType,true), StructField(depdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crsarrtime,IntegerType,true), StructField(arrdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crselapsedtime,DoubleType,true), StructField(dist,DoubleType,true))

paragraphs.title: Read the data from MapR-DB into a Dataset of type Flight
paragraphs.text:
import com.mapr.db._
import com.mapr.db.spark._
import com.mapr.db.spark.impl._
import com.mapr.db.spark.sql._

 val spark: SparkSession = SparkSession.builder().appName("flightread").getOrCreate()
 var tableName = "/user/mapr/flighttable"
 
 // load dataset from MapR-DB 
val df = spark.sparkSession.loadFromMapRDB[Flight](tableName, schema)

msg.data:

import com.mapr.db.spark._

paragraphs.title: What are the Originating Airports with the most Delays > 40 minutes ?
Show the Query Plan with projection and filter push down

msg.data:
== Physical Plan ==
*(3) Sort [count#549L DESC NULLS LAST], true, 0
+- Exchange rangepartitioning(count#549L DESC NULLS LAST, 200)
   +- *(2) HashAggregate(keys=[src#5], functions=[count(1)])
      +- Exchange hashpartitioning(src#5, 200)
         +- *(1) HashAggregate(keys=[src#5], functions=[partial_count(1)])
            +- *(1) Project [src#5]
               +- *(1) Filter (isnotnull(depdelay#9) && (depdelay#9 > 40.0))
                  +- *(1) Scan MapRDBRelation(/user/mapr/flighttable,StructType(StructField(id,StringType,true), StructField(fldate,StringType,true), StructField(month,IntegerType,true), StructField(dofW,IntegerType,true), StructField(carrier,StringType,true), StructField(src,StringType,true), StructField(dst,StringType,true), StructField(crsdephour,IntegerType,true), StructField(crsdeptime,IntegerType,true), StructField(depdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crsarrtime,IntegerType,true), StructField(arrdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crselapsedtime,DoubleType,true), StructField(dist,DoubleType,true)),MapRDBTableScanRDD[0] at RDD at MapRDBBaseRDD.scala:21,InsertOrReplace) [src#5,depdelay#9] PushedFilters: [IsNotNull(depdelay), GreaterThan(depdelay,40.0)], ReadSchema: struct<src:string,depdelay:double>

paragraphs.title: Average Departure Delay by Carrier
paragraphs.text:
%sql select carrier, avg(depdelay)
from flights
group by carrier

paragraphs.title: Average Departure Delay by Origin
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT origin, avg(depdelay) as avgdelay
FROM flights 
GROUP BY origin
ORDER BY avgdelay desc

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.title: Average Departure Delay by Destination
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT dst, avg(depdelay) as avgdelay
FROM flights 
GROUP BY dst
ORDER BY avgdelay desc

paragraphs.title: Average Departure Delay by Day of the Week
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT dofW, avg(depdelay) as avgdelay
FROM flights 
GROUP BY dofW
ORDER BY avgdelay desc

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure Delays by Day of the Week (1=Monday, 7=Sunday)
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select dofW, count(depdelay)
from flights where depdelay > 40
group by dofW

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure Delays by Hour of Day
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select crsdephour, count(depdelay)
from flights where depdelay > 40
group by crsdephour

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure Delays by Origin
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select src, count(depdelay)
from flights where depdelay > 40
group by src
ORDER BY src

paragraphs.title: Count of Delays > 40 min by Dest
paragraphs.text:
%sql

from flights where depdelay > 40
group by dst

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure Delays by Origin and Destination
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select src, dst, count(depdelay)
from flights where depdelay > 40
group by src, dst

paragraphs.title: Read Airports file for Graph Vertexes
paragraphs.text:
var file2: String = "/user/mapr/data/airports.json"
val airports = spark.read.json(file2)
airports.createOrReplaceTempView("airports")
airports.count
airports.show

paragraphs.title: How many flights are in the data set? How many airports?
What are the longest delays for  flights  that are greater than  1500 miles in  distance?
Show Query Plan with Filter push down

msg.data:
== Physical Plan ==
*(2) Sort [depdelay#9 DESC NULLS LAST], true, 0
+- Exchange rangepartitioning(depdelay#9 DESC NULLS LAST, 200)
   +- *(1) Filter (isnotnull(dist#13) && (dist#13 > 1500.0))
      +- *(1) Scan MapRDBRelation(/user/mapr/flighttable,StructType(StructField(id,StringType,true), StructField(fldate,StringType,true), StructField(month,IntegerType,true), StructField(dofW,IntegerType,true), StructField(carrier,StringType,true), StructField(src,StringType,true), StructField(dst,StringType,true), StructField(crsdephour,IntegerType,true), StructField(crsdeptime,IntegerType,true), StructField(depdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crsarrtime,IntegerType,true), StructField(arrdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crselapsedtime,DoubleType,true), StructField(dist,DoubleType,true)),MapRDBTableScanRDD[0] at RDD at MapRDBBaseRDD.scala:21,InsertOrReplace) [id#0,fldate#1,month#2,dofW#3,carrier#4,src#5,dst#6,crsdephour#7,crsdeptime#8,depdelay#9,crsarrtime#10,arrdelay#11,crselapsedtime#12,dist#13] PushedFilters: [IsNotNull(dist), GreaterThan(dist,1500.0)], ReadSchema: struct<id:string,fldate:string,month:int,dofW:int,carrier:string,src:string,dst:string,crsdephour...

paragraphs.text:
%md
PageRank works by counting the number and quality of edges to a vertex

msg.data: PageRank works by counting the number and quality of edges to a vertex

paragraphs.title: Use Pagerank to find most important airports
Pregel Aggregate Messages to calculate avg delay
paragraphs.text:
val AM = AggregateMessages
    val msgToSrc = AM.edge("depdelay")
    val agg = {
      graph.aggregateMessages
        .sendToSrc(msgToSrc)
        .agg(avg(AM.msg).as("avgdelay"))
        .orderBy(desc("avgdelay"))
        .limit(5)
    }
    agg.show()

Motif search for flights Delays From LAX  through IAH to LGA on the same day
paragraphs.text:
val paths = graph.find("(a)-[ab]->(b); (b)-[bc]->(c)").filter("(a.id =='LAX') and (b.id =='IAH') and (c.id =='LGA') and (bc.arrdelay>40) and (ab.arrdelay>40)and(bc.crsdephour + bc.depdelay > ab.crsdephour + ab.arrdelay ) and (ab.fldate == bc.fldate)").limit(20)

z.show(paths.select($"ab", $"bc"))
